briefTitle: Multicenter, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled Comparing Test Fluorouracil Cream to Carac Cream in Actinic Keratosis
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel Group Comparison Study to Determine the Therapeutic Equivalence of Generic Fluorouracil Cream, 0.5% and Carac® (Fluorouracil) Cream, 0.5% in Subjects With Actinic Keratoses
summary: This study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of a generic formulation of fluorouracil 0.5% cream against the brand product (Carac) in participants with actinic keratoses.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Treatment Success (Complete Clearance) at Week 6
